incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To Mobilis Network In Algeria

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Mobilis Network in Algeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Mobilis Network in Algeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: Delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations

incident_updates.body: Our engineering team has confirmed that they are seeing recovery in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations, with provisioning times nearly back to normal after the carrier applications team applied a temporary fix. The carrier's development team is still working on a permanent solution and expects to have it in place soon. We will continue to monitor the current queue time and work to resolve any numbers that experienced provisioning issues during this degradation. We will provide updates in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - SMS

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issues causing delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations and are still working on the fix with the carrier. We will provide updates in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Flex Insights Planned Maintenance

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, August 3rd, 2024, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window, Insights Historical Dashboards will be unavailable, and any scheduled ETLs will be affected.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

scheduled_maintenances.name: Authy and Verify V1 API - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned Global maintenance between 15:00 to 15:30 Pacific Time on 08/03/2024. During the maintenance window, all Authy API requests will fail. Communicate to your customers (end users) about this planned downtime for maintenance before August 3, 2024. Due to Authy APIs deprecation (https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/authy-vs-verify), we strongly encourage migrating to the Verify V2 API. Verify V2 API, specifically SMS/Voice OTP delivery, is unaffected by this maintenance downtime.

affected_components.name: ACCOUNT SECURITY - Authy 2FA
ACCOUNT SECURITY - Authy App

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 28 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 05 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
07 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 07 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
12 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 12 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
14 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 14 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
19 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 19 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
21 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 21 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
26 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 26 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
28 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 28 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: TaskRouter Scheduled Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
The  maintenance activity is now being pushed out to the 6th Aug at 21:00 PST
Maintenance Details: We will be performing a brief TaskRouter database update in the US1 region, specifically removing a non-essential component from our system. This update is expected to be completed in less than a second and should not affect your service.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system's performance during and after the update to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency Plan: In the unlikely event of any issues, we are prepared to revert the changes immediately. Should a rollback be necessary, there may be a  downtime of approximately 2 minutes
